news_header: Two new members are nominated for the Board of F-Secure, alongside re-elections of existing members.
news_original_title: F-Securen hallitukseen ehdolla kaksi uutta jäsentä
news_text: F-Secure's Board of Directors will include two new nominees, Alessandro Adriani and Rachit Mittal, in addition to re-elections of current members. The Board will consist of seven members, with Mittal being an employee of F-Secure. The re-elected members include Pertti Ervi, Petra Supersahiho, and Tommi Uitto, along with Adriani, Diaconescu, Mittal, and Schaurecker. Adriani brings extensive experience from global telecom and B2B tech sectors, while Mittal has a strong background in planning and strategy alignment across various industries.
